get.description: Get blocks for the authenticated user.
get.summary: Get blocks

parameters.description: The number of blocks to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of blocks to offset the returned blocks by.
parameters.name: offset

delete.description: Delete all blocks for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve a block by block ID
get.summary: Get a block by block ID

delete.description: Delete a block by block ID
delete.summary: Delete a block by block ID

get.description: Get bookmarks for the authenticated user. If an ID is provided, it will return an array with that specific bookmark if found. Alternatively, you can provide count and offset parameters to paginate through all of your bookmarks.
get.summary: Get bookmarks

parameters.description: The ID of a specific bookmark to retrieve
parameters.name: bookmarkID

parameters.description: The number of bookmarks to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The number of bookmarks to offset the returned bookmarks by. For example, offset=10&count=10 would return bookmarks 10-20
parameters.name: offset

delete.description: Delete all bookmarks for the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a specific bookmark by its ID.
get.summary: Get a bookmark by ID

parameters.description: The ID of the bookmark to retrieve
parameters.name: bookmarkID

delete.description: Delete a specific bookmark. Either a bookmark ID or a post ID must be provided. If both are provided, the bookmark ID will be used. Only the owner of the bookmark can delete it. Admins can delete any bookmark.

parameters.description: The ID of the bookmark to delete
parameters.name: bookmarkID

parameters.description: The ID of the post to delete the bookmark for
parameters.name: postID

get.description: Get a specific bookmark by its post ID.
get.summary: Get a bookmark by post ID

parameters.description: The ID of the post to retrieve the bookmark for
parameters.name: postID

get.description: Get posts based on a particular algorithm (Not Implemented)
get.summary: Get algorithm-based feed

get.description: Get posts in a chronological order
get.summary: Get chronological feed

get.description: Get posts for the explore section (Not Implemented)
get.summary: Get explore feed

get.summary: get all files owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new file from the provided form data

delete.description: Delete all files owned by the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve files by ID

get.description: Get a list of all users that are following a user by user ID
get.summary: Get a list of all users that are following a user by user ID

get.description: Get a count of all users that are following a user by user ID
get.summary: Get a count of all users that are following a user by user ID

get.description: Retrieve likes. If a like ID is provided, it is always used. Otherwise, a postID will return all likes for that post. If a userID is also provided, it will return either the like for that user/post or an empty array. If only a userID is provided, it will return all likes by that user for any post.
get.summary: Get likes

post.description: Create a new like for a user based on the provided token
Authenticate a user and return a JWT token

get.description: Verify a JWT token
get.summary: Verify Token

parameters.description: The privacy setting of the post
parameters.name: privacy

parameters.description: The UUIDs of the media files attached to the post
parameters.name: mediaIDs

get.summary: Get a post
